description: Registry of available actions for AI planning in the JSON-centric orchestration system

actions.name: send_reply_text
actions.description: Send a text reply to a message in a Matrix room

text.description: The text content to send as a reply

reply_to_event_id.description: The event ID of the message to reply to (optional, for threading)

actions.name: send_message_text
actions.description: Send a standalone text message to a Matrix room (not a reply)

actions.name: react_to_message
actions.description: Add an emoji reaction to a specific message

event_id.description: The event ID of the message to react to

emoji.description: The emoji to use as a reaction (e.g., 'üëç', '‚ù§Ô∏è', 'üòÇ')

actions.name: describe_image
actions.description: Generate a detailed description of an image that was shared in the chat

image_event_id.description: The event ID of the image message to describe

focus_areas.description: Optional list of specific aspects to focus on in the description

actions.name: manage_user_memory
actions.description: Store, update, or retrieve information about a specific user

user_id.description: The Matrix user ID to manage memory for

operation.description: The operation to perform on user memory

memory_key.description: The key/category for the memory item (e.g., 'preferences', 'context', 'facts')

memory_value.description: The value to store or update (required for store/update operations)

actions.name: manage_channel_summary
actions.description: Create, update, or retrieve a summary of channel conversation history

operation.description: The operation to perform on the channel summary

summary_scope.description: The scope of messages to include in the summary

custom_focus.description: Optional custom focus or theme for the summary

actions.name: manage_system_prompt
actions.description: Update or retrieve the system prompt configuration for AI behavior

operation.description: The operation to perform on the system prompt

prompt_section.description: The specific section of the system prompt to modify

new_content.description: The new content for the prompt section (required for 'set' operation)

actions.name: get_room_info
actions.description: Retrieve information about the current Matrix room

info_type.description: The type of room information to retrieve

actions.name: delegate_to_openrouter
actions.description: Delegate a complex query to OpenRouter with specific model and parameters

query.description: The query or prompt to send to OpenRouter

model.description: Specific model to use (optional, uses default if not specified)

include_context.description: Whether to include current conversation context

response_format.description: Expected response format from the model

actions.name: do_not_respond
actions.description: Explicitly choose not to respond to a message (useful for messages that don't require a response)
